price: 118 La vérité éclata et leurs manœuvres furent démasquées.
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
